name: Married filers at high income in Zug (2026)
description: Married couple with combined income of CHF 150,000 in Zug, the lowest-tax canton

sources.description: Zug has Switzerland's lowest tax rates. Taxable income for federal: 150000 - 9580 - 9600 = 130820 (with 2026 married deduction of 2800). Federal tax ~4013 CHF. Cantonal/Municipal 5% for married mid-income in Zug. Social 6.39% (unemployment capped).
